mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT id, name, ingredients, accessories, introduction, label, cooking, favor, functions, target, disease, constitution, cuisine, snack, type, kitchenware, occasion from food where name like "%"#{keyword}"%" or ingredients like "%"#{keyword}"%" or accessories like "%"#{keyword}"%" or label like "%"#{keyword}"%" limit #{ignoreNum},#{numOfpage}

SELECT DISTINCT id, name, ingredients, accessories, introduction, label, cooking, favor, functions, target, disease, constitution, cuisine, snack, type, kitchenware, occasion from food where id = #{id}
